alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 1:19PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Calhoun, southwestern Sumter and southeastern Richland Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 118 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near SC State Farmer`s Market to 6 miles north of Elloree. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Cayce, McEntire Air Base, St. Matthews, Eastover, Congaree National Park, Hopkins, Sandy Run, Fort Jackson, Gadsden, Poinsett State Park, Horrel Hill, Pinewood, New Zion, Rosewood, Poplar Creek Landing, Fort Motte, Stumphole Landing, Fort Jackson Wildcat Road and Creston. This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 between mile markers 121 and 125. Interstate 77 between mile markers 3 and 13. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
